name: SEG Media Group
tag_list: marketing, advertising, web-design, graphic-design, brand-development, branded-video-production, music-promotion, promotional-advertising
overview:
SEG Media Group is leading the way in brand development, graphic design, branded video entertainment, marketing, web design, music promotion and promotional advertising.

Our team has more than 30 years of marketing-communications, graphic design, and multi-media entertainment experience. We have:

Extensive experience on the client side managing marketing, business development and communications for publicly traded companies and Top 500 Retail corporations

A highly skilled and experienced media relations team with experience working within the media outlets clients needs to penetrate

Strong proven expertise in Internet strategy and digital communications including, Web-site development, search marketing and social media, as well as advertising and business development

Highly accomplished and skilled writers and editors

Strong technology infrastructure and technology including the industry’s best resources: EntireWeb, MMD, AP, Apex, CS5.5, Autodisk & plus a proprietary interactive news release distribution and newsroom platform

Multi-lingual team
